Articles.Content: Questions about equipment, which one is good:D

Hi mellox, and welcome to the forums!

Your question is pretty vague. Most of the parts are good for one purpose or another. Was there something more specific you were interested in learning about?

> 
> Questions about equipment, which one is good:D

Well, they usually say the equipment doesn't matter, but your skill in using it.

Heyho mellox first off, welcome to the forums ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

As Red Iron Crown already stated, your question is a little to vague to give a definite answer. Alsmost every piece of equipment in the game is good for one thing or another, if you could let us know what exactly you need the equipment for I would be more than happy to help.
